'''''cilya''''' is a noun meaning "chasm, cleft, gorge" in [[Quenya]].<ref>{{MR|P2i}}, p. 89</ref>

==Etymology==
''cilya'' derives from the [[Sundocarme|root]] [[KIL-]].<ref>{{LR|Etymologies}}, '''KIL-'''</ref>

==Examples==
* ''[[Calacirya|Cala'''cirya''']]'' = "Cleft of Light"
* ''eari ullier i '''kilyanna''''' = "the seas poured into the chasm"<ref>{{LR|Lost}}, p. 47</ref>

==See also==
*[[Sindarin]]: ''[[cirith]]''
